title: 'Greening' Squeezes Florida's Citrus Industry
teaser: Florida's citrus industry has been hit hard by "greening," a disease that has already wreaked havoc in other parts of the globe. The disease has caused a sharp drop in the number of oranges, grapefruits and tangerines harvested in the Sunshine State.
